price: "Kuma a lõkacin da Na yi wahayi zuwa ga Hawãriyãwa* cewa ku yi ĩmãni da Ni, kuma da Manzo Na. Suka ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni, kuma ka shaida da cewa lalle mu, mãsu sallamãwa ne."
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡتُ إِلَى ٱلۡحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِي وَبِرَسُولِي قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَٱشۡهَدۡ بِأَنَّنَا مُسۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: * Hawãriyãwa su ne sahabban Ĩsã, amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi. Sunã sanyãwar farãren tufãfi, dõmin haka aka yi musu suna da haka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh awḥaytu ilā al-ḥawāriyīna an āminū bī wabirasūlī qālū āmannā wa-ish'had bi-annanā mus'limūna
